concept.title: How to migrate from Katalon Studio - Standalone Edition to Platform Edition
concept.shortdesc: This document shows you how to migrate from to

conbody.p: From version 8.5.0, Katalon Studio has two editions: and .
The is a component of the Katalon Platform - a modern, comprehensive quality management platform that enables teams to efficiently test, launch, and optimize testing without any complicated setup.
If your team decides to migrate from the platform solution, your team can collaborate, manage, scale, and continuously improve testing operations, all in one platform.
Before migrating to Platform Edition, make sure that:

li.p: Your team can use on-cloud solutions
Your Git repository can be connected to the Katalon Platform

conbody.p: If your team cannot use Katalon Studio with internet access or your team cannot use Git, then might be a more suitable solution.
